title: Where are we heading
creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, Gil Brealey, Dept of Health and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Presents an open-ended look at the effects that different parental attitudes to life and the family unit have on adolescents. Directed mainly at adult audiences, especially parents and community leaders. Note: Restricted to tertiary institutions, teaching hospitals, police and customs departments.
creator_credit_for_label: Arch Nicholson, Gil Brealey, Dept of Health and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
